title: ЛАПТОП LENOVO LOQ 15IRH8 I5-12450H/8GB DDR5/512GB/RTX 2050 4GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:15.6" (39.5cm)
Резолуција:(1920 x 1080) FHD, IPS, 350nits, Anti-glare, 45% NTSC, 144Hz, G-SYNC®
Процесор:Intel® Core™ i5-12450H, 8C (4P + 4E) / 12T, P-core 2.0 / 4.4GHz, E-core 1.5 / 3.3GHz, 12MB
Графика:NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2050 4GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 1575MHz, TGP 70W
Внатрешна меморија:8GB SO-DIMM DDR5-4800
Меморија:512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0x4 NVMe®
Без оперативен систем
Аудио:High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
Звучник:Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Gaming Audio
Камера:HD 720p with E-shutter
Микрофон:2x, Array
Ethernet:100/1000M (RJ-45)
WLAN + Bluetooth:Wi-Fi® 6, 11ax 2x2 + BT5.1
Порти:
1x Ethernet (RJ-45)
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Power connector
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4)
2x USB 3.2 Gen 2
Power Adapter:135W Slim Tip (3-pin)
Батерија:Integrated 60Wh
